calc.plugin package¶

Submodules¶

calc.plugin.graph module¶

class calc.plugin.graph.GraphMixin¶

Based on the Linux FS paradigm, a few more tricks for graph.Graph.

ls()¶
Returns:generator that recursively iterates through self
cd(path)¶
Parameters:path (str) – one of
  • relative path. parent .. and previous - supported
  • absolute path, e.g. /QD/15A vacuum
Return type:

graph.Node
Raises:
  • LookupError – if non-existent
  • ValueError – if path is illegal
pwd¶
Returns:absolute path
